page.title: 08SCOUT MEETING.
page.content: On Monday evenings at about 7.00 pm I leave home to go to attend our weekly Scout Meeting. The meeting starts at 7.30 pm with a ceremony when we raise the Union Jack. Then we split into our various Patrols for inspection of uniforms by our Scout Master. We then get into two teams for a game of some sort, after which we work in our patrols to practice skills ready to take our 'badges' eg. Scout Standard, Advanced Scout Standard and Chief Scout. The meetings finish when we strike the flag at 9.00 pm.
